title: Filing a General Diary for Financial Disputes
description: Step-by-step guide to file a GD when someone owes you money or refuses to return your deposit

steps.title: Gather Required Documents
steps.description: Collect your rental agreement, deposit receipt, any written communication with landlord, and your National ID card.

steps.title: Visit the Police Station
steps.description: Go to the police station in the area where the dispute occurred. You can file a GD at any time during office hours.

steps.title: Request GD Form
steps.description: Ask the duty officer for a General Diary form. Explain that you want to file a complaint about a financial dispute.

steps.title: Fill Out the Form
steps.description: Provide complete details: your information, landlord's information, incident details, amount involved, and timeline of events.

steps.title: Submit and Get Receipt
steps.description: Submit the form and ensure you get a copy with the GD number and official stamp. Keep this safe as proof of filing.

title: Filing a Consumer Complaint
description: How to file a complaint for defective products or poor services

steps.title: Collect Evidence
steps.description: Gather purchase receipts, product photos, warranty cards, and any communication with the seller.

steps.title: Contact the Seller First
steps.description: Try to resolve the issue directly with the seller or service provider. Keep records of these attempts.

steps.title: Visit Consumer Affairs Office
steps.description: If direct contact fails, visit your local Consumer Affairs office or the National Consumer Rights Protection office.

steps.title: File Written Complaint
steps.description: Submit a written complaint with all supporting documents. Include timeline, financial loss, and desired resolution.

title: Filing a Police Complaint
description: General guide for filing police complaints and FIRs

steps.title: Determine Complaint Type
steps.description: Decide if your issue requires an FIR (for serious crimes) or a General Diary (for other issues).

steps.title: Prepare Your Statement
steps.description: Write down all details: what happened, when, where, who was involved, and any witnesses.

steps.title: Visit Police Station
steps.description: Go to the police station with jurisdiction over the area where the incident occurred.

steps.title: File the Complaint
steps.description: Provide your statement to the duty officer. For FIRs, police must register immediately for cognizable offenses.

steps.title: Get Documentation
steps.description: Ensure you receive a copy of your complaint with case/GD number and officer's signature.

title: Obtaining a Birth Certificate
description: Complete guide to get your birth certificate from government offices

steps.title: Determine the Right Office
steps.description: Visit the Registrar office of the area where you were born, or your local Union Parishad.

steps.title: Collect Required Documents
steps.description: Bring hospital birth certificate, school admission certificate, parents' ID cards, and recent passport-size photos.

steps.title: Fill Application Form
steps.description: Complete the birth registration application form with accurate information. Double-check all details.

steps.title: Pay Fees
steps.description: Pay the prescribed government fee. Keep the receipt as proof of payment.

steps.title: Submit and Track
steps.description: Submit your application and get a receipt with application number. Use this to track your application status.

title: Applying for a Passport
description: Step-by-step process to apply for a Bangladeshi passport

steps.title: Online Pre-Application
steps.description: Visit the official passport website and fill out the online application form. Print the confirmation page.

steps.title: Prepare Documents
steps.description: Gather birth certificate, National ID, photographs, and other required documents as per the checklist.

steps.title: Visit Passport Office
steps.description: Go to your designated passport office with all documents and the printed application form.

steps.title: Verification and Payment
steps.description: Complete the verification process, pay fees, and provide biometric data (fingerprints and photo).

steps.title: Collection
steps.description: Wait for the specified time and collect your passport on the given date with the receipt.

title: Getting a Trade License
description: How to obtain a trade license for your business

steps.title: Choose License Type
steps.description: Determine what type of trade license you need based on your business category and location.

steps.title: Prepare Business Documents
steps.description: Gather business registration papers, owner's NID, business address proof, and bank statements.

steps.title: Visit City Corporation/Municipality
steps.description: Go to your local City Corporation or Municipality office with all required documents.

steps.title: Application and Inspection
steps.description: Submit application with fees. Officials may inspect your business location.

steps.title: License Issuance
steps.description: After verification and approval, collect your trade license certificate.
